DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect sirolimus prevention new non-melanoma skin cancer ( NMSC ) kidney transplant recipient .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Effect Sirolimus Non-Melanoma Skin Cancer Kidney Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Kidney transplant least 1 year prior Subjects function renal allograft calculate glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) ≥40mL/min ( Nankivell method ) proteinuria ≤500mg/day . Stable cyclosporine tacrolimusbased multidrug immunosuppressive regimen History NMSC within last 3 year History cancer within last 3 year NMSC metastatic disease 20 NMSC lesion last 12 month Multiple organ transplant
